turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I need help managing my bank account. I want to see my transaction history.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! I can certainly help with that. To view your transaction history, please specify the account you'd like to view and the date range you're interested in.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, I want to see the transactions for my checking account for the last month. But this website is so slow, it's making me crazy!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. Please allow a moment while I retrieve the information. Can you confirm the last four digits of your account number? Also, while you wait, I should tell you that the current system is experiencing a slightly higher load than usual, which might be the reason for the delay.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: My account number ends in 1234. Also, I was wondering... why do I get charged a monthly maintenance fee? My balance is always above the minimum required.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you. I have pulled up your transaction history. Regarding the maintenance fee, I am unable to access the terms and conditions of your account. I recommend you contact our customer support or check the documents you received when opening the account.
